CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.label: compound tin
CosmereScadrial.Def.AllomanticAbilityDef.description: Compounding tin clouds the world in silence and blur. Senses dull, colors fade, and sounds become muffled â€” all to pour future clarity into the metalmind. With enough sacrifice, the Allomancer will one day see farther, hear sharper, and feel every detail with unbearable precision.
